extendedInfo.description: >>>>>>> Do You Want to Effectively Double Your Reading Speed and Accelerate Your Learning Abilities to the Extreme? <<<<<<<Did you know that some people can read more than a thousand words per minute as compared to an average college student who can only read between 250 and 350 wpm?Thatâs true!Anyone can double their speed in reading without the fear of not being able to understand the materials being read.The Speed Reading Monster Course:  Accelerate Your Reading and Learning Abilities to the Extreme!Features of this app:1. Monster course on speed reading2. Tips to improve your reading speed average3. Illustrative videos on speed reading techniques4. How speed reading is tested or calculated5. Newspaper reading method6.
